import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'
import { Form, Field } from '../index.js'

<Playground>
  <Form onSubmit={() => {}}>
    <Field>Name</Field>
    <Field type="email">Email</Field>
    <Field type="password">Password</Field>
    <Field required type="select" options={['hi']}>
      Type
    </Field>
  </Form>
</Playground>

<Playground>
  <Form onSubmit={() => {}}>
    <Field>Name</Field>
    <Field type="email">Email</Field>
    <Field type="password">Password</Field>
    <Field type="tags">Tags</Field>
    <Field type="number">Number</Field>
    <Field
      required
      type="select"
      options={['Scott', 'Courtney', 'Landon', 'Brooklyn']}
    >
      Type
    </Field>
    <Field type="textarea">Text Area</Field>
    <Field type="markdown">Markdown</Field>
    <Field type="toggle">Markdown</Field>
  </Form>
</Playground>
